body:
This might not be a bug and I'm doing something wrong. Trying to get spack spec turbine+python+r
to use system R and python. Please guide. Thanks:

packages.yaml has a new location? .spack/linux? or just .spack. It has contents:
```
packages:
  R:
    paths:
      R@4.0.0%gcc@9.3.0 arch=xlinux-ubuntu20.04-sandybridge: /usr
    buildable: False
  python:
    paths:
      python@3.7.6%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-sandybridge: /home/rajeev/anaconda3/
    buildable: False
```
